entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: WNW 25 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
